Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_xclass_xpropvalue_perm_source_id_itemtype_id] ON [innovator].[XCLASS_XPROPVALUE_PERM] ( [SOURCE_ID] ASC, [ITEMTYPE_ID] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [RELATED_ID] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
